homepage.title: Nala Beauty
homepage.subtitle: Nails & Lashes & Pedicure
homepage.description:
Welcome to Nala Beauty salon. We do nails, lashes and pedicure in Kaisaniemi - the heart of Helsinki. Find us at the address Vuorikatu 8A30 Helsinki. We serve you professionally with care. Book your appointment with our professional technician now and get served today!

We do personal discounts for every customer!
homepage.offerDescription: Avaustarjouksena -50% alennus kaikista palveluistamme alkuperäisistä hinnoista ensimmäisen kuukauden aikana (1.11-30.11)!

contact.title: Contact Info
contact.openingHours:
Mon - Sat: 9:00 - 20:00

Sun: 10:00 - 17:00 (or to be agreed in advance)
contact.description: From Espressohouse inside the University of Helsinki metro station, take the escalator up to the upper floor (Exit F). After that, go up the stairs to the top floor. At the top of the stairs, go outside and look to the right!

treatments.title: Our services
treatments.description: We implement beauty treatments according to your wishes. Our professional works with a creative and subtle approach.

point1.title: Nails
point1.description: Trendy nails, classic French varnishes, decorative nails or still and natural nails - beautiful and well-kept nails will be noticed! In our selection you can find natural nail manicures and gel polish. We also do structural nails with acrylic and gel. We give 5 days warranty for your nails.

point2.title: Lashes
point2.description: We make attractive and high-quality eyelash extensions quickly and neatly. Our services include classic and volume eyelash extensions, hybrid lashes, design lashes, lash lift as well as shaping and coloring of the corners.

point3.title: Pedicure
point3.description: Pamper yourself with a relaxing and caring spa pedicure. Our luxurious spa pedicure includes exfoliation, nail care and gel polish. Varnishing can also be done with gel according to wishes. Our foot care is done in massaging spa chairs, which guarantees a relaxing experience.

treatments.button: Book your appointment now and get yourself treated with us
treatments.buttonDescription: Varaa aikasi nyt ja hanki itsesi hoitoon kanssamme

giftcard.title: A gift card to a beauty salon
giftcard.description: The most pampering gift idea for the holidays is a gift card to Nala Beauty. A gift card to a beauty salon is a classic gift that brings a good mood and feeling, this gift will not disappoint! You can buy a gift card for yourself or your loved one in our salon.

ehdot.title: Terms
ehdot.content: Cancellation or rescheduling of a reservation is possible up to 10-12 hours before the reserved time. If a reservation is cancelled or not notified on the same day, the company has the right to charge 80% of the service price. When the store is closed, leave a message or call us.

directions.title: How to Find Us
directions.fromMetro: From the University of Helsinki metro station
directions.metroDescription: We are located just above the University of Helsinki metro station. Here is the direction video instructed how to reach NALA BEAUTY by metro
directions.kaisaniemiDescription: Here is the direction video instructed how to reach NALA BEAUTY from Kaisaniemi road

policy.title: Salon Policy
policy.intro: From this page, you can find out NALA BEAUTY salon policy, our guarantee as well as refund policy. Please read through carefully before making a reservation.
policy.policy1: Clearly stating which service you wish to receive.
policy.policy2: Informing the staff in advance if you are allergic to any chemicals or substances before the service begins.
policy.policy3: Providing feedback and comments to the staff about their service during the treatment so that we can meet your expectations in the best possible way.
policy.policy4: Immediately notifying the staff or the salon manager if you have concerns about the salon, staff, or service.
policy.policy5: Immediately informing the salon manager if you experience an abnormal reaction or issue with your nails or any other treated area after the service.
policy.policy6: Ensuring that children are always accompanied by an adult. We are not responsible for accidents that may occur to children during the treatment at the salon.
policy.policy7: Noting that we are not responsible for the loss or damage of personal items in the salon.
policy.policy8: Noting that clients must cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled appointment. Late cancellations or no-shows may be charged.
policy.policy9: Noting that the salon does not take photos or videos of clients without written consent.
policy.warrantyIntro:
Remember: Nails are jewels, not tools.

Be gentle with your nails, and they will stay beautiful for weeks after the service.
policy.warranty1:
A 7-day warranty is provided for gel polish, extensions, and lashes.

If you notice lifting, chipping, or other issues within 7 days, call us, and we will book an appointment for a free repair.
policy.warranty2: The repair appointment must be made within 7 days of the original visit.
policy.warranty3: Repairs after 7 days are chargeable, including damages caused by the client's own actions, such as nail breakage or scratching.
policy.warranty4: We are not responsible for broken nails or falling lashes after you have left the salon if you have not followed the provided aftercare instructions.
policy.warranty5: Our warranty does not cover issues caused by the customer's own actions, such as using nails as tools or home repairs or ripping off your lashes.
policy.specialCircumstances1: If you experience an abnormal reaction, such as nail inflammation or an allergic reaction, contact us immediately for advice.
policy.specialCircumstances2: Nail removals: Nail work done by others or home removal or repair attempts are not covered under warranty. We recommend booking an appointment with a professional for safe nail removal.
policy.refundIntro:
Cash refunds are not granted after you have left our salon.

Leaving the salon is considered as acceptance of the service result and indicates that you are satisfied with it.
policy.refund1: If you are not satisfied with your nails, inform the staff before payment. We will make the necessary corrections to ensure your satisfaction, or we will remove any enhancements or coatings applied.
policy.refund2Title: Refunds will not be given due to change of mind.
policy.refund2: Once you have paid for the service and accepted the result, we cannot provide a refund simply due to a change of mind.
policy.refund3Title: We will fix service errors free of charge.
policy.refund3: If you are not satisfied with the quality of the work, let us know immediately after the service. We will offer a free correction. A free correction service is only available if you report the issue immediately after the service ends.
policy.refund4Title: Refunds are approved only in exceptional cases.
policy.refund4: If a refund is approved, it will be processed via bank transfer within 30 days. Refunds require the provision of bank details.
